Posts.EditableText:
I've recently been getting a "Sorry an internal error has occurred" when editing my game.  It seems entirely random and once I get that message it seems random when the game returns to normal.  I've had normalcy return immediately at times but most often it is anywhere between 5 minutes and 5 hours.  I've tried refreshing, relogging, etc.

I am using the web-based version.

Thanks for any help you can give.  Thanks!
Posts.HTML:
I've recently been getting a "Sorry an internal error has occurred" when editing my game. It seems entirely random and once I get that message it seems random when the game returns to normal. Posts.EditableText: Is there anything in particular you're doing when it happens? I know I caused internal errors in the past while editing script, if I put the wrong stuff in. I'm not saying you're doing that, but that's the only thing I know for sure from my own experience.
Posts.HTML: Is there anything in particular you're doing when it happens? I know I caused internal errors in the past while editing script, if I put the wrong stuff in. I'm not saying you're doing that, but that's the only thing I know for sure from my own experience.

Posts.EditableText: I haven't gotten it in a while, so I didn't come back to check your response.  Sorry!  For future reference, I was doing nothing out of the ordinary.  I was just editing my game and in some cases it would lock it up.  I'm not sure what was going on, but it did seem entirely random when it happened and when it "auto-corrected".
